bug.name: Attack Order
bug.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

bug.name: Bug Bite
bug.effect: The user eats the foe's held Berry.

bug.name: Bug Buzz
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special Defense is lowered by 1.

bug.name: Defend Order
bug.effect: The user's Defense and Special Defense are raised by 1.

bug.name: First Impression
bug.effect: Priority. This move fails if not used on the first turn the user is in battle.

bug.name: Fury Cutter
bug.effect: If this move hits, its damage increases by +1 for each consecutive hit.

bug.name: Heal Order
bug.effect: The user recovers up to half of its max HP.

bug.name: Infestation
bug.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

bug.name: Leech Life
bug.effect: The user recovers HP equal to half the damage dealt.

bug.name: Lunge
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Strength is lowered by 1.

bug.name: Megahorn
bug.effect: Low Accuracy.

bug.name: Pin Missile
bug.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

bug.name: Pollen Puff
bug.effect: If the target is an ally, it recovers up to half of its max HP.

bug.name: Powder
bug.effect: Priority. If the target uses a Fire-type move this round, it fails and the target takes damage equal to its own Special stat.

bug.name: Quiver Dance
bug.effect: The user's Special, Special Defense, and Dexterity are raised by 1.

bug.name: Rage Powder
bug.effect: Priority. All incoming attacks are redirected to the user for this round.

bug.name: Silver Wind
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, all of the user's stats are raised by 1.

bug.name: Skitter Smack
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

bug.name: Spider Web
bug.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

bug.name: Steamroller
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

bug.name: Sticky Web
bug.effect: Sets a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Pokémon entering the field have their Dexterity lowered by 1.

bug.name: String Shot
bug.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 2.

bug.name: Struggle Bug
bug.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

bug.name: Tail Glow
bug.effect: The user's Special is raised by 3.

bug.name: Twineedle
bug.effect: This move hits twice. Roll 1d6 for each hit. On a 6, the target is Poisoned.

bug.name: U-turn
bug.effect: After attacking, the user switches out.

bug.name: X-Scissor
bug.effect: None.

dark.name: Assurance
dark.effect: If the target has already taken damage this round, this move's damage is doubled.

dark.name: Baddy Bad
dark.effect: Sets up Reflect on the user's side of the field for 5 rounds.

dark.name: Beat Up
dark.effect: This move hits once for each conscious Pokémon in the user's party.

dark.name: Bite
dark.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

dark.name: Brutal Swing
dark.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

dark.name: Comeuppance
dark.effect: Deals damage equal to 1.5 times the damage last taken by the user.

dark.name: Crunch
dark.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

dark.name: Dark Pulse
dark.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

dark.name: Darkest Lariat
dark.effect: Ignores the target's Defense and Evasion boosts.

dark.name: Embargo
dark.effect: The target cannot use held items for 5 rounds.

dark.name: False Surrender
dark.effect: This move never misses.

dark.name: Feint Attack
dark.effect: This move never misses.

dark.name: Fiery Wrath
dark.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets Flinch.

dark.name: Flatter
dark.effect: Raises the target's Special by 1, but also Confuses it.

dark.name: Fling
dark.effect: The user throws its held item. Damage depends on the item.

dark.name: Foul Play
dark.effect: Uses the target's Strength stat to calculate damage.

dark.name: Hone Claws
dark.effect: The user's Strength and Accuracy are raised by 1.

dark.name: Jaw Lock
dark.effect: The user and the target are both trapped and cannot switch out.

dark.name: Knock Off
dark.effect: The target's held item is knocked off and cannot be used for the rest of the battle.

dark.name: Kowtow Cleave
dark.effect: This move never misses.

dark.name: Lash Out
dark.effect: If the user's stats were lowered this round, this move's damage is doubled.

dark.name: Memento
dark.effect: The user faints, but the target's Strength and Special are lowered by 2.

dark.name: Nasty Plot
dark.effect: The user's Special is raised by 2.

dark.name: Night Daze
dark.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Accuracy is lowered by 1.

dark.name: Night Slash
dark.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

dark.name: Obstruct
dark.effect: Priority. Protects the user from all attacks. If a contact move is blocked, the attacker's Defense is lowered by 2.

dark.name: Parting Shot
dark.effect: Lowers the target's Strength and Special by 1, then the user switches out.

dark.name: Payback
dark.effect: If the user acts after the target, this move's damage is doubled.

dark.name: Power Trip
dark.effect: This move's damage increases by +1 for each of the user's stat boosts.

dark.name: Punishment
dark.effect: This move's damage increases by +1 for each of the target's stat boosts.

dark.name: Pursuit
dark.effect: If the target is switching out, this move hits before it switches and its damage is doubled.

dark.name: Quash
dark.effect: The target is forced to act last this round.

dark.name: Snarl
dark.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Special is lowered by 1.

dark.name: Snatch
dark.effect: Priority. The user steals the effects of the next support move the target uses.

dark.name: Sucker Punch
dark.effect: Priority. This move fails if the target is not using an attacking move.

dark.name: Switcheroo
dark.effect: The user and the target swap held items.

dark.name: Taunt
dark.effect: The target can only use attacking moves for 3 rounds.

dark.name: Thief
dark.effect: The user steals the target's held item.

dark.name: Topsy-Turvy
dark.effect: All of the target's stat changes are reversed.

dark.name: Torment
dark.effect: The target cannot use the same move twice in a row.

dark.name: Wicked Blow
dark.effect: This move is always a critical hit.

dragon.name: Breaking Swipe
dragon.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, lowers their Strength by 1.

dragon.name: Clanging Scales
dragon.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. The user's Defense is lowered by 1.

dragon.name: Core Enforcer
dragon.effect: If the target has already acted this round, its Ability is suppressed.

dragon.name: Draco Meteor
dragon.effect: The user's Special is lowered by 2 after use. Low Accuracy.

dragon.name: Dragon Breath
dragon.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

dragon.name: Dragon Claw
dragon.effect: None.

dragon.name: Dragon Dance
dragon.effect: The user's Strength and Dexterity are raised by 1.

dragon.name: Dragon Darts
dragon.effect: This move hits twice. Can target two different Pokémon.

dragon.name: Dragon Energy
dragon.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Damage is reduced the lower the user's HP is.

dragon.name: Dragon Hammer
dragon.effect: None.

dragon.name: Dragon Pulse
dragon.effect: None.

dragon.name: Dragon Rage
dragon.effect: This move always deals 40 damage.

dragon.name: Dragon Rush
dragon.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches. Low Accuracy.

dragon.name: Dragon Tail
dragon.effect: The target is forced to switch out.

dragon.name: Dual Chop
dragon.effect: This move hits twice.

dragon.name: Dynamax Cannon
dragon.effect: If the target is Dynamaxed, this move's damage is doubled.

dragon.name: Eternabeam
dragon.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

dragon.name: Outrage
dragon.effect: The user attacks for 2-3 rounds and becomes Confused afterward.

dragon.name: Roar of Time
dragon.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

dragon.name: Spacial Rend
dragon.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

dragon.name: Twister
dragon.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches. Can hit Pokémon in the air.

electric.name: Aura Wheel
electric.effect: Raises the user's Dexterity by 1. Type changes to Dark if Morpeko is in Hangry Mode.

electric.name: Buzzy Buzz
electric.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Charge
electric.effect: The user's Special Defense is raised by 1. The next Electric-type move used by the user has its damage doubled.

electric.name: Charge Beam
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the user's Special is raised by 1.

electric.name: Discharge
electric.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets are Paralyzed.

electric.name: Eerie Impulse
electric.effect: Lowers the target's Special by 2.

electric.name: Electric Terrain
electric.effect: Creates an Electric Terrain for 5 rounds. Pokémon on the ground cannot fall asleep and their Electric-type moves are powered up.

electric.name: Electrify
electric.effect: The target's next move becomes Electric-type.

electric.name: Electro Ball
electric.effect: Damage increases the faster the user is than the target.

electric.name: Electroweb
electric.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 1.

electric.name: Ion Deluge
electric.effect: Priority. For the rest of the round, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type.

electric.name: Magnetic Flux
electric.effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of allies with the Plus or Minus Ability by 1.

electric.name: Magnet Rise
electric.effect: The user is immune to Ground-type moves for 5 rounds.

electric.name: Nuzzle
electric.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Overdrive
electric.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

electric.name: Parabolic Charge
electric.effect: The user recovers HP equal to half the damage dealt.

electric.name: Plasma Fists
electric.effect: For the rest of the round, all Normal-type moves become Electric-type.

electric.name: Rising Voltage
electric.effect: If the target is on Electric Terrain, this move's damage is doubled.

electric.name: Shock Wave
electric.effect: This move never misses.

electric.name: Spark
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Stoked Sparksurfer
electric.effect: This move is always a critical hit. The target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Thunder
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed. Can hit Pokémon in the air. Low Accuracy.

electric.name: Thunder Cage
electric.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

electric.name: Thunder Fang
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed or Flinches.

electric.name: Thunder Punch
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Thunder Shock
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Thunder Wave
electric.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Thunderbolt
electric.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Volt Switch
electric.effect: After attacking, the user switches out.

electric.name: Volt Tackle
electric.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

electric.name: Wild Charge
electric.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 of the damage dealt.

electric.name: Zap Cannon
electric.effect: The target is Paralyzed. Very Low Accuracy.
